mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT S.NO, S.FILEPATH, P.CATEGORY, S.TITLE, P.ADDRESS1, P.ADDRESS2, S.PRICE FROM SHARE S, PLACE P WHERE P.NO = S.PLACE_NO AND P.REMOVEDATE IS NULL ORDER BY S.NO DESC LIMIT #{param1}, #{param2}
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(S.TITLE) as totalPage FROM SHARE S, PLACE P WHERE P.NO = S.PLACE_NO AND P.REMOVEDATE IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(S.NO) as totalPage FROM SHARE AS S, PLACE AS P WHERE P.NO = S.PLACE_NO AND P.REMOVEDATE IS NULL AND P.ADDRESS1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2}, '%') AND P.CATEGORY = #{param1}
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(S.NO) as totalPage FROM SHARE AS S, PLACE AS P WHERE P.NO = S.PLACE_NO AND P.REMOVEDATE IS NULL AND P.ADDRESS1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2}, '%')
